name: masks_to_boxes
description: Compute the bounding boxes around the provided masks. Returns a [N, 4] tensor containing bounding boxes. The boxes are in (x1, y1, x2, y2) format with 0 <= x1 < x2 and 0 <= y1 < y2.

inputs.name: masks
inputs.description: (Tensor[N, H, W]) â€“ masks to transform where N is the number of masks and (H, W) are the spatial dimensions.
